answers.answer: Hi there!Yes, these are symptoms of diabetes, but similar symptoms could also be caused by a few other conditions. I would suggest getting these evaluated by a primary care physician at this time. After a diagnosis is established with appropriate testing, a management plan can be drafted accordingly.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I've been very tired lately mild headaches, constant thirst n frequent urination I feel like I have an urge to pee every 2 to 3 hours suntyms every hour. What are the clear symptoms of diabetes.
title: urgent help how do i tell its diabetes
